These stories, roughly paralleling the original Wedding Peach storyline, feature younger characters aimed at a younger audience.\n\nWedding Peach: Young Love is a collection of these often-overlooked episodes. Fans of the original series will be tickled to see their favorite characters, both hero and villain, recast in this warm and fuzzy alternate adventure.\n\nYazawa even throws in a few new characters for readers to fall in love with. There's the demon trio of Blitz, Cloud and Noise and a few more Jama folk, too. Together, they join Wedding Peach and her heavenly crew for one final tussle between good and evil.\n___\nThe series was only published in volume from outside of Japan, and was released as \"Volume 7\" of [the original series](https://mangadex.org/title/13e39275-7b8b-4b70-a758-1314392e0e48/wedding-peach) in some countries."},"links":{"mu":"lt2imii"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

The hot guy sitting so close to her makes Akira's heart beat faster, and he even likes games, too. She invites him over to play games without really thinking it through...\n\nAs a penalty for losing to him, Keiichi kisses her on the back of the hand, and things only escalate from there. 0c306a6c-f889-4ef2-8641-e53469d89626:::||@!@||:::2024-04-15T03:31:17:::||@!@||:::{"id":"0c306a6c-f889-4ef2-8641-e53469d89626","title":{"en":"Nichiren"},"description":{"en":"In 13th-century Japan, disease, famine, violence, and natural disasters plague society. Samurai lords, blinded by power, shirk any responsibility to protect the citizenry. Religious leaders care more about currying favor with the powerful than helping common people find hope and a positive way to deal with their suffering. But one unknown Buddhist monk dares to speak the truth to power: Nichiren remonstrates with the authorities. He insists that all human life is precious and that the government needs to change its ways and become of service to the people. He criticizes the established religions as being merely pawns of the state, who teach ideas that only further the people’s sense of powerlessness. The true purpose of Buddhism, he asserts, is to teach people a way to empower themselves, challenge their destiny, and experience happiness in this life. Based on actual events, this exciting comic touches on major milestones in Nichiren’s life interwoven with basic Buddhist principles. Kumagawa Harumi, một cựu diễn viên giờ đây đang sống cuộc sống của một nhân viên phòng kinh doanh trong một công ty thực phẩm vì những lý do riêng, tình cờ gặp một cô gái 15 tuổi tên Fuyuumi Ao giữa đám đông sầm uất của Shibuya.\n\nBị thu hút mãnh liệt bởi tài năng diễn xuất vượt trội của cô gái này, Kumagawa quyết định đánh cược lớn khi yêu cầu mua tài năng của cô với giá 30 triệu yên và trở thành quản lý của Ao với quyết tâm đưa cô đến với ánh hào quang của giới showbiz.\n\nTuy nhiên, đồng thời, Ao lại mang trong mình một mục đích khác: tìm ra sự thật đằng sau cái chết của nữ diễn viên tài năng đã khuất, Amatsu Rei.\n\nMột câu chuyện trả thù đầy kịch tính, hứa hẹn sẽ làm rung chuyển cả ngành giải trí, chính thức bắt đầu!"},"links":{"al":"175799","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DKTFGK9Z","bw":"series/490786/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/864524","mal":"172627","raw":"https://www.manga-up.com/titles/1349"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

12c3fb1c-e094-49cf-9648-317a2ba60829:::||@!@||:::2024-04-15T03:31:17:::||@!@||:::{"id":"12c3fb1c-e094-49cf-9648-317a2ba60829","title":{"en":"Shigeru Mizuki's Tono Monogatari"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Mizuki Shigeru no Toono Monogatari"},{"ja":"水木しげるの遠野物語"},{"en":"Shigeru Mizuki's Tales of Tono"}],"lastChapter":"29","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la"],"description":{"en":"In celebration of it's 100th anniversary in publication, Mizuki Shigeru illustrates 29 of the stories contained within the legendary book, \"Tono Monogatari\" (Tales of Tono), which was originally written way back in 1910 by the much revered \"Godfather of Yokai\", Yanagita Kunio.\n\nEach of the 29 chapters is a faithful adaption of their respective stories seen through the eyes of a studious Mizuki Shigeru.","es-la":"Shigeru Mizuki -el gran maestro del cómic yokai- adapta una de las obras más importantes de la literatura sobrenatural en forma de manga. El equivalente cultural de los cuentos de hadas de los hermanos Grimm, Tono Monogatari es un texto definitorio del folclore japonés y una de las obras literarias más importantes del país. Esta novela gráfica fue creada durante la última etapa de la carrera de Mizuki, después de haberse retirado del trabajo diario de los cómics comerciales para crear obras de arte personales y duraderas.\n\nEscrito originalmente en 1910 por los folcloristas e investigadores de campo Kunio Yanagita y Kizen Sasaki, Tono Monogatari celebra y archiva las leyendas de la región de Tono. Estas historias se registraron a medida que la rápida modernización de Japón provocaba la desaparición de la cultura tradicional.\n\nEsta adaptación mezcla el texto original con la autobiografía: Mizuki intenta seguir el camino de Yanagita y Sasaki, pero se da cuenta de que su viejo cuerpo no está preparado para seguir sus pasos. Mientras Mizuki deambula por Tono, vuelve a contar algunas de las leyendas más famosas, manifestando una serie de monstruos, dragones y zorros. En el final, Mizuki se encuentra con el propio Yanagita y se sientan a discutir sus obras."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/水木しげるの遠野物語／水木版妖怪大戦争-水木しげる漫画大全集-コミッククリエイトコミック-水木しげる-ebook/dp/B085774LKC/ref=monarch_sidesheet_title","bw":"de7c8c71e9-016b-44a4-8455-28c5c854f15e","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2899474","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/579110/","mal":"22623"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

The setting is an apartment complex built during Japan's period of rapid economic growth. There, elderly people are living alone with their cats, waiting for their \"solitary death\" that will come someday. What kind of story will they face tomorrow? The author, 76 years old and living in an apartment complex herself, depicts the overwhelming present as the future for all of us. The latest work by Saito Nazuna, winner of the Japan Cartoonists Association excellence award and the manga division of the Japan Media Arts Festival Manga's excellence prize for \"Yuugure e.\""},"links":{"al":"172227","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/%E9%BD%8B%E8%97%A4%E3%81%AA%E3%81%9A%E3%81%AA-ebook/dp/B0BS68PZ8X/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1AX6KHUXLOEAD\u0026dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.qrEOPKz8uhmtR5UgWdr6p7BE9Jt0AtJ8H4bqgdLbnQdrDPo8p6aoEwCiDqQDrw3srRQ4qynTvqW1OIGxYGB_U-1EKB2cAvtBpm3-nLvyY_ALgXSsw6kfUuZ2S6Nwgb6eLNGTW69TJRkRaPLu0VVneUzNbE_zdpfeGywpteFJgeV0IgXI7xL_JvFm5la80nU4.J3dkIVYBHnHobyXgk147C3xJlTTyF8qxlAtaIPDl_Fk\u0026dib_tag=se\u0026keywords=%E3%81%BC%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A1%E6%AD%BB%E3%81%AE%E9%A4%A8\u0026qid=1711550141\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sprefix=%E3%81%BC%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A1%E6%AD%BB%E3%81%AE%E9%A4%A8%2Cdigital-text%2C219\u0026sr=1-1","bw":"debfa7a1ad-4ef0-4410-881b-bb00df0ac50e","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/744303/","mu":"w738e4v"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

However, there is a distance between the feelings she is entrusted with and the cats that are entrusted to her, and the monologues of the two resonate together, creating a tranquil, poetic world. There is a line in \"Sakura ni Kaze\": \"When you think, 'I will be kind, and will not lose my kindness,' you feel lonely. When you wonder who my efforts to be kind have helped... you feel covered in wounds.\" A world of sharp sensitivity and poetry that entrusts the delicate emotions of an independent woman to the supple posture of a cat. The masterpieces of the author, who passed away suddenly, are revived. Included are \"Exit,\" \"Naughty Cat,\" \"Fleeting Cat in Boots,\" and \"Time Soldier.\" One work not included in the book and a newly discovered precious cat illustration are included for the first time!"},"links":{"al":"113835","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/%E3%82%84%E3%81%BE%E3%81%A0%E7%B4%AB-ebook/dp/B095K5G3KX/ref=sr_1_2?crid=38DM5BLBTD476\u0026dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.KSCotx_F6dR3vcMJRkF5eVtFDajBLqV9BtwjC4mjUywLaDtqXy4_XeTtW1Bc-3n2sX9XlmQlih4vOFyla7rfdelIepa2vRxtTaog0RzsZxGdE3HldBygMTWsrk8bBcKJ-uRCJCcEsO5JTE7UiVob3w.D0IKHQ9Xs7Cm3iHTtboc-LAbTFxW1EmPGe-c1Q6LgoU\u0026dib_tag=se\u0026keywords=%E6%80%A7%E6%82%AA%E7%8C%AB\u0026qid=1711549633\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sprefix=%E6%80%A7%E6%82%AA%E7%8C%AB%2Cdigital-text%2C240\u0026sr=1-2","bw":"de5cd4010e-9ad0-4d89-aa4a-4583e4e3aacf","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/641676/","mu":"0pedjoj"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

Cautiously, she lets her lover in—a wolf of a man wielding a bouquet of roses. His shoulders must have been four inches wider than mine. As I stood behind him, I fantasized about the broadness of his chest and the thickness of his neck…and about becoming his mistress once again.\n\nAnd so their story goes. For a young woman interested in love without the hassle of a traditional relationship, an affair with someone else’s spoiled husband is just what she ordered—until it’s time to move on.\n\nThen there’s Yuko: with even less time for married men’s shenanigans, she turns her attention to her aging father and the guilt of adultery that has gnawed at his heart for years. Her mother is long dead, yet her memory is enshrined for eternity in their—both father’s and daughter’s—mirrored indiscretions.\n\n(source: Drawn \u0026 Quarterly)"},"links":{"al":"137334","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/やまだ紫-ebook/dp/B095K68HB6/ref=sr_1_1?crid=L95FKENGJ51O\u0026dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.ivq7KU7RilyNoiYyGhKnNg.lwnoUqxAt13V4zUeVvY3lIluwFG08J4myJj6mxrNnbA\u0026dib_tag=se\u0026keywords=ゆらりうす色\u0026qid=1711549241\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sprefix=ゆらりうす色,digital-text,229\u0026sr=1-1","bw":"de64481a8c-3124-49cd-95ba-c8e5c3adb748","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/641678/","engtl":"https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/second-hand-love/","mu":"5351yfc"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.\n\nWhen reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.\n\nThe skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!"},"links":{"mu":"42pzcnq","raw":"https://piccoma.com/web/product/158151"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Eines Tages entdecken neugierige Mädchen aus Refugia in einer Bibliothek ein geheimnisvolles altes Buch und eine rote Halskette. Ohne zu wissen, was sich in ihrem Besitz befindet, folgen sie neugierig den blauen Glühwürmchen aus der Stadt und überschreiten dabei Grenzen, die noch nie zuvor jemand überschritten haben. Sans savoir la nature de ces objets mais curieuses de découvrir la luciole bleue, elles traversent le mur que personne n'avait osé dépasser auparavant. Suatu hari, para gadis yang diatur oleh sistem Refugia menemukan buku kuno dan kalung merah di perpustakaan. Її місто Рефуґія — під суворим контролем та повністю відгороджене від магії. Одного дня місцеві допитливі дівчатка знаходять у бібліотеці давню книгу з таємничим посланням: «Зніміть прокляття з Острова Блакитних Світлячків», — та намисто, багряне й чіпке. Вони з властивою цікавістю слідують за блакитними світлячками, перетинаючи бар'єри, які ще ніхто ніколи не перетинав, за межі міста. Що криє собою таємниця Рефуґії, що стоїть за блакитними світлячками?
